columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the  stage.

columns.name: rest_api_id
columns.description: The id of the rest api which contains this stage.

columns.name: deployment_id
columns.description: The identifier of the Deployment that the stage points to.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The timestamp when the stage was created.

columns.name: cache_cluster_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether a cache cluster is enabled for the stage.

columns.name: tracing_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether active tracing with X-ray is enabled for the Stage.

columns.name: access_log_settings
columns.description: Settings for logging access in this stage.

columns.name: cache_cluster_size
columns.description: The size of the cache cluster for the stage, if enabled.

columns.name: cache_cluster_status
columns.description: The status of the cache cluster for the stage, if enabled.

columns.name: client_certificate_id
columns.description: The identifier of a client certificate for an API stage.

columns.name: documentation_version
columns.description: The version of the associated API documentation.

columns.name: last_updated_date
columns.description: The timestamp when the stage last updated.

columns.name: canary_settings
columns.description: A map of settings for the canary deployment in this stage.

columns.name: method_settings
columns.description: A map that defines the method settings for a Stage resource.

columns.name: variables
columns.description: A map that defines the stage variables for a Stage resource.

columns.name: web_acl_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the WebAcl associated with the Stage.
